participant_1.background:
I want to be in good shape for my cosplay at Comic Con, so I try to exercise every day.
I once got to meet a real unicorn in the forest near my house.
i m recently divorced.
I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.
i am a vet tech.

participant_2.background:
I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family.
I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want.
I spent my last birthday volunteering for an environmental campaign.
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.
My favorite thing is to create music, as it allows me to express myself and connect with others.

content.text: Hey, whats up!
Not much! Just working on some music. How about you?
Im pretty good! I just got back from the gym and I'm about to start working on my cosplay.
Oh cool! What are you cosplaying as?
I'm going to be Harley Quinn for Comic Con!
Oh thats awesome! I love Harley Quinn!
Thanks! Yeah she's my favorite comic book character.
What got you into cosplaying?
I've always been a huge fan of comic books and superheroes, so it seemed like a natural fit.
That makes sense. Its really cool that you get to dress up as one of your favorite characters.
Yeah it is! I love it!
Do you have any other hobbies or interests?
Yeah, I love to play video games and I also like to volunteer at my local animal shelter.
Oh thats great! I love video games too! What's your favorite game?
I love playing The Sims, but I also like playing Call of Duty and Mario Kart.
Oh nice! I love The Sims too! I also like playing Animal Crossing and Stardew Valley.
Oh those are great games too! I love the relaxing atmosphere of Animal Crossing.
Yeah it is really relaxing. I love to just collect stuff and decorate my house.
Me too! I'm really excited for the new Animal Crossing game that's coming out this year.
Me too! I've been waiting for it for a long time.
Have you been following the news about it?
Yeah, I've been watching all the trailers and reading all the articles about it.
Me too! I'm so excited to play it!
Me too! I can't wait to see what new features it has.
